Team outings, play an integral role in promoting creativity, collaboration and overall productivity. When there is a heavenly beach locale closer to home, why look elsewhere for a Corporate Day Out. The 5-star luxury, The Raviz Kovalam resort is located just 9 miles away from Trivandrum city and a 40 minute drive from the airport. .
.
For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
